docs.snippet: How President Trump threw aside caution and agreed to meet with North Korea’s Kim Jong-un in a daring and risky diplomatic gambit to end a nuclear standoff.

docs.snippet: Mr. Trump is making his first visit as president to California at a time of extraordinary tensions between these two governments.

docs.snippet: In a pair of tweets, President Trump cited “not much political support” now to move ahead with his pledges after the deadly mass school shooting in Florida.

docs.snippet: Though he has lately resisted the impulse to criticize “Saturday Night Live,” President Trump was lured into an online war of words with Mr. Baldwin, who plays him on the show.

docs.snippet: The play, about a divisive antihero and whistle-blower, has no good guys, and a town tragically divided by politics.

docs.snippet: To many in the capital, the pornographic film actress has become an unexpected force. But those who know her well view the moment differently.

docs.snippet: The president, goaded by conservatives, is targeting an effort to address racial disparities in school discipline, arguing that any relaxation of policies could let a killer slip through the cracks.
